title: When does minesweeper 2 come out?
body: I've been playing league of legends since pre-season 4 and since t hen my favourite game to play in queue times has been minesweeper, I have downloaded all the mods and dlc for it but want to know when minesweeper 2 comes out so I can practise straight away for esports.

replies.body: I heard Valve bought the rights so it'll probably be bundled with Half Life 3.
